mapper.select: SELECT id, name, gero_id, nssf_id, archive_id, area_id, care_level, checkin_date, checkout_date, apply_url, survey_url, assess_url, track_url, pad_mac FROM T_ELDER WHERE T_ELDER.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_ELDER(name, nssf_id, gero_id, archive_id, area_id, care_level, checkin_date, checkout_date, apply_url, survey_url, assess_url, track_url, pad_mac) VALUES (#{name}, #{nssfId}, #{geroId}, #{archiveId}, #{areaId}, #{careLevel}, #{checkinDate}, #{checkoutDate}, #{applyUrl}, #{surveyUrl}, #{assessUrl}, #{trackUrl}, #{padMac})
mapper.update: UPDATE T_ELDER SET T_ELDER.name = #{name}, T_ELDER.nssf_id = #{nssfId}, T_ELDER.archive_id = #{archiveId}, T_ELDER.area_id = #{areaId}, T_ELDER.care_level = #{careLevel}, T_ELDER.checkin_date = #{checkinDate}, T_ELDER.checkout_date = #{checkoutDate}, T_ELDER.apply_url = #{applyUrl}, T_ELDER.survey_url = #{surveyUrl}, T_ELDER.assess_url = #{assessUrl}, T_ELDER.track_url = #{trackUrl}, T_ELDER.pad_mac = #{padMac} WHERE T_ELDER.id = #{id}
